charinfo.name: Uzuki Yugao
charinfo.description: A member of Konoha's Anbu faction; Yugao is a hard working kunoichi who puts all her might into anything she does. In combat, Yugao mixes sword, speed, and jutsu for some devastating results.

abilities.name: Hazy Moon Night
abilities.description: Yugao covers herself in a haze, and strikes one enemy, dealing 50 damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Moon Haze
abilities.description: Yugao lets the shade of the moon grant her strength. For 1 turn, Yugao will gain 20 destructible defense and the next time 'Hazy Moon Night' is used, it will deal 25 additional damage. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Sealing Technique
abilities.description: Yugao negates one enemy's abilities. For 2 turns, that enemy will ignore all damage reduction, destructible defense, counters, reflects, invulnerabilities and ignores on them. This skill ignores invulnerability, and cannot be countered, reflected, or ignored.

abilities.name: Yugao Parry
abilities.description: This skill makes Uzuki Yugao invulnerable for 1 turn.
